SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order_info (user_id, item_id, promotion_id, order_price, order_amount, order_total, order_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{promotionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update order_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, promotion_id = #{promotionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_total = #{orderTotal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, item_id, promotion_id, order_price, order_amount, order_total, order_time from order_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, user_id, item_id, promotion_id, order_price, order_amount, order_total, order_time from order_info
